Text:
For Those Who Are New To "iTunes LP",This LP Features :-

1.Note From The Band
2.Meeting Of Thousand Suns (30 Mins Film)
3.Songs List (+Play)
4.The Catalyst:Video (iTunes Quality)
5.Photos
6.Credits
7.Puzzle
And The Background Design Rocks!!!
So Linkin Park Fans..... This Is A Must Download

for some reason the songs all work fine, and when I launch iTunes LP it seems to work perfectly, even the videos play, but when I go to "song list" none of the music will play when i click "play song". What's going on?

@PMartinez :- Its Same With Me.... Dont Know Why??.... But When We Close The LP And Click The Song From The Tracklist It Works..... Looks Like iTunes Did A Mistake There Or From Where i Got This,He Did...LOL......
I downloaded the songs only and the sound is really good.
me also downloads the songs and video(meeting of a thousand suns) only for great quality. But anyway thanks for sharing :-)
